2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Sn(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="K sub s p equals 4 times S cubed, which <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="K sub s p equals S squared, which equals 3.47 times 10 to the The equilibrium constants for the dissolution (<math alttext="K sub s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>) of various substances in aqueous solution at <math alttext="25 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> are listed in the table above. Which of the following provides a correct comparison of the molar solubilities (<math alttext=" S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>S</mi></mrow></math>) of some of these substances based on their <math alttext="K sub s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The molar solubilities for <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are calculated using <math alttext="s equals the square root of K sub s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> has a lower molar solubility than <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The molar solubilities for <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are calculated using <math alttext="s equals the square root of K sub s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a lower molar solubility than <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The molar solubilities for <math alttext="S n open parenthesis, O H, close parenthesis, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Sn(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="M g F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgF</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are calculated using <math alttext="S equals the square root of the fraction of K sub s p over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="M g F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgF</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> has a lower molar solubility than <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The molar solubilities for <math alttext="S n open parenthesis, O H, close parenthesis, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Sn(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="M g F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>MgF</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are calculated using <math alttext="S equals the square root of the fraction of K sub s p over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="S n open parenthesis, O H, close parenthesis, 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Sn(OH)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> has a lower molar solubility than <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The molar solubilities for <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are calculated using <math alttext="s equals the square root of K sub s p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>S</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>K</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="C u C N" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CuCN</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has a lower molar solubility than <math alttext="N i C O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>NiCO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
